title: Uber Faces Accusations of Sexual Harassment (Audio)
itunes:title: Uber Faces Accusations of Sexual Harassment (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Michael Selmi, a professor at George Washington University Law School, discusses the latest developments in accusations at Uber for allowing an environment of sexual harassasment among the company's software engineers. He speaks with June Grasso and Michael Best on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
